content: I'd love to join in on a game of soccer. Where and when?
Thanks for the heads up! Going up there this weekend!
Idk, I've loved longboarding there in the past. Some parts are a tad bumpy, but on the whole the trail is a charm
I know the place you are talking about! I love heading over there as well
Another place that you might also like is the trail out on Mercer Island
Sad to hear, though all of the Mt Tiger trails are iffy on their views when it comes to fog. Have you done the other two?
